subject: Baseball
Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The free agent Marlon Byrd, who will be on the restricted list while he serves the suspension, tested positive for Tamoxifen, which can reduce side effects of steroid use and increase testosterone.
snippet: The free agent Marlon Byrd, who will be on the restricted list while he serves the suspension, tested positive for Tamoxifen, which can reduce side effects of steroid use and increase testosterone.
